name: Momma Duck
text: If a "Duck" monster(s) is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon this card from hand or GY. If this card is Special Summoned by its own effect: You can Special Summon "Duck" monster(s) in Defense Position, from your GY that have been destroyed this turn, then immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon a Link 3 "Duck" monster. You can only use each effect of "Momma Duck" once per turn.
